Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory242.png'}
{3: 'No matter how many times she has seen Kowloong, she is still stunned by its magnificence every time.'}
{3: 'A city engulfed by rainbow-colored light, sparks flashing from the numerous buildings—even when it is a mini "exhibition" version, it is still breathtaking.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png'}
{3: 'On the other side, a large ship slowly appears on the projected water.'}
{3: 'On the ship are the shadows of people, never-dimming lights, and a faint singing voice.'}
{3: '～Of flexile and simulacrous make...～'}
{3: '～Thusly it cometh and goeth at the pluck of digits ten...～'}
{3: '～How transient its flutter...～'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory681.jpg'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: "I can't believe Cervantes was able to recreate both Kowloong and the Nighter.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: 'But this layout... Do we have to separate into two groups and visit different exhibition halls?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sica looks from left to right indecisively.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'On her left, Ayla is staring at the exhibition hall in front of her, eager to rush in, while Trojan is just standing there without expressing much interest.'}
{3: 'On her right, Lena holds onto her bow, mindlessly cleaning it, her gaze sometimes wanders over to Trojan and Sica.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Lena? Is something the matter?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her gaze drops as she continues to wipe the non-existent dust off her bow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'So, how should we divide?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: 'Any suggestions, Ayla?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the only member from the WGAA, Ayla is the one who understands Cervantes the most, which was why Sica asked Ayla.'}
{3: "Brought back to her senses by Sica's voice, Ayla turns with her arms folded and looks at her teammates who are in different mentalities."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hm, according to my understanding of Kowloong and the Nighter, Kowloong should be the "main route" while the Nighter should be the "side quest."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'From the experiences before, I can see that Cervantes put in a lot of thought when recreating these exhibitions. He prioritized authenticity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "So why don't Trojan and I visit the Kowloong exhibition and Sica and Lena can check out the Nighter?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Trojan is not at her best due to frame issues but she can balance out my inexperience.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'While Lena has both experience and power, so you can familiarize yourself with Sica.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What do you think, Sica?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: '...I think that is sensible, right, Lena?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lena frowns, not exactly satisfied with this grouping. She purses her lips and unconsciously tightens her grip on her weapon.'}
{3: 'On a personal level, she does not want to deepen her connection with this overly young commandant.'}
{3: 'Rash, youthful, all talk with no action, she is not good with this kind of people, but...'}
{3: 'Her gaze lingers on Trojan for a second before quickly averting it.'}
{3: 'A dated frame, from Kurono, and a mysterious past...'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: "It's nothing.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lena lowers her gaze as if to hide.'}
{2: 'Lena', 3: "I do not object. I'll go over to the Nighter with Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: "Then it's settled.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: 'Ayla and Trojan will go to the Kowloong exhibition, while Lena and I will investigate the Nighter exhibition.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: "And... we'll reconvene here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After confirming the assembly point, Sica and Lena head off first to the Nighter exhibition, and Lena seems to be explaining something to Sica on the way.'}
{3: 'Seeing the two off, Trojan asks uncertainly.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Are those two... really going to be fine?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What could possibly happen?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'What if like in the exhibition hall before the mechanoids battle and the two of them get into an argument?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'I thought you would suggest for me to pair up with Sica, while you buddy up with Lena.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hm... I think you're overthinking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "We're all on the same team anyway, we have to time get to know each other and one day we'll be close enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So, no need to ignore the relationship between those two—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Eh?! There are carvings on the window up ahead! Is that the legendary ancient Kowloong window frame patterns?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla runs over excitedly, Trojan glances over in the direction of Sica and Lena once more, before following Ayla deeper into the exhibition.'}
